Flying, haste
[i]Fortunate Son[/i] – If you would roll one or more dice, instead roll that many dice plus one and ignore the lowest roll.
[i]Hero to the Rescue![/i] – Whenever Percy, Luck's Sidekick enters or attacks, roll two d4 and choose one result. Target creature you control gets +X/+0 where X is the result. Return target nonland permanent with mana value less than or equal to the other result.
